title.full: Sesame Street Once Upon a Monster Demo

description.full: Jump into a storybook adventure with the Sesame Street: Once Upon a Monster demo.   From innovative game developer Double Fine Productions comes a storybook adventure of whimsical discovery and outrageous fun, featuring popular Sesame Street characters and quirky, new monsters!   This Controller-free gaming experience is full of life lessons, like building friendships, sharing and conquering fears.  Perfect for kids, and fun for the entire family!  Drop-in/drop-out co-op is ideal for parent/child or sibling play.  Join the fun!  Full game coming October 2011 exclusively on Kinect™ for Xbox 360®.
description.short: Jump into a storybook adventure with the Sesame Street: Once Upon a Monster demo.   From innovative game developer Double Fine Productions comes a storybook adventure of whimsical discovery and outrageous fun, featuring popular Sesame Street characters and quirky, new monsters!
